articles.description: The NRL star’s inappropriate text messages have caused more than just the cancellation of a wedding.
articles.content:
NRL star Mitchell Pearces texting scandal has caused a dramatic fallout, over and above the last-minute cancellation of his wedding to Kristin Scott.
The Daily Telegraph is reporting Pearces inappro… [+2987 chars]
